## styles variable

**Signature:**

```typescript
styles: (options: TemplateOptions) => import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles
```

## Example

unknown target

```
const buttonTag = tagFor(options.button);
...
${buttonTag} {
  width: 200px;
}
```
